works.description:
I have typed out some text in my blog  
footer that was  meant to communicate my copyright over content in the  
site. Others are copying this content on to their own site.

The text is below:

"All content in this website including text and pictures is copyrighted
and  
belongs to the author. If you need to use it or reproduce it, please ask  

first. Any unauthorized usage will constitute plagiarism."
